name: Gift Stacker
description:
My submission for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition.

You need to stack as many gifts as you can in Santa's sleight without any going overboard.

Press SPACE to drop a gift.

There is also a special Christmas Hat item that spawn randomly after stacking at least 5 gifts.

Credits :

Everything was made by myself except for the music.

You can find the songs artist here: https://soundcloud.com/muzstation-game-music
